metadata.title: USN-6113-1 -- Jhead vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Jhead did not properly handle certain crafted images while processing the Exif markers. An attacker could possibly use this issue to crash Jhead, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6113-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  jhead - 1:2.97-1+deb8u2ubuntu0.1~esm4 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
